segments.text: Could you show me some scarves ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of scarf shall I show you ? We have them in all sorts and sizes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Show me some of the latest fashion , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: At your service . Will this suit you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it will ; this must be the foreign produce .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me try it on . I think it really suits me . Can you give me some discount on it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s already fifty yuan off the original price .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , we can ’ t come down any more .
segments.speaker: S2
